name: 張裕煦

schedule:
1-3週   chapter 1. Atomic structure
3-5週   chapter 2. Molecular structure and bonding
exam 1

exam 3

final

Inorganic chemistry  
OXFORD 6th edition
Weller, Overton, Rourke, and Armstrong
